title: Shepardize a Case
description: Before citing a case in a brief, an associate must Shepardize it (or use a similar tool like KeyCite) to ensure it is still good law.

tasks.description: Identify the case citation to be checked.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the correct case citation.

tasks.description: Enter the citation into a citator tool like Shepard's or KeyCite.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses the legal research tool to check the case's history.

tasks.description: Review the results to see if the case has been overruled, reversed, or criticized by later cases.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the case is still good law and has not been negatively treated.
